fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Do not touch. May be venomous.
Town (Protective)
Attack: Varies
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Stand guard at a player's house, giving them Basic defense and dealing a Powerful attack to all their visitors if they are attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > When you die, deal a Basic attack to all your visitors.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Town.
